SceneDescription.name: Introduction
SceneDescription.description:
Lord Borkus: "Make sure those maids get all their work done. No breaks, no gossiping, nothing. "
Lord Borkus: "I don’t care if you have to threaten them, they’re replaceable. Just make sure it gets done."
Lord Borkus: "If you fail to do this...you can join them in their fate..."
